Sorry for the mess, our website is still under construction.

Welcome to CapTerra, Calgary’s premier design and landscaping professionals. We provide a variety of services scaled for every budget. Whether you’re looking to create a dream garden, refresh a tired landscape, or craft an inviting backyard oasis, CapTerra is ready to help! Our certified Horticultural Technologist offers custom residential landscape designs, 3D renderings, and planting consultations suitable for Southern Alberta's climate. Our construction crews will build decks and pergolas, patios, pathways and retaining walls. We also offer shrub pruning and seasonal cleanups to keep your yard looking great all year long. Contact us today for a consultation and check us out on Instagram to see our recent projects. Instagram
